{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Belkin WeMo Mini Smart Plug (F7C063).jpeg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wemo Mini Smart Plug |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.belkin.com/us/p/P-F7C063/ |sp = http://www.belkin.com/us/support-product?pid=01t340000046qMfAAI |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Belkin_WeMo_Mini_Smart_Plug_(F7C063) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Belkin |model = F7C063 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = WeMo |type = home automation switch |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = K7SF7C063 |icid = 3623A-F7C063 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7688AN;MT7688AN, 1614-AJCSL, EAP0G257; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 575 / 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25;66049L800032, 619HUA TWN; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 120 |pwr_ac_hz = 60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.3 |pwr_conn = NEMA 5-15P
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Dual Comparator;Texas Instruments;LM393A;LM393A, 4BA, P12763;;1; |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WSMM-126 |manuf_rev = 1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/21/2016 |estreldate = 01/03/2017 |estprice = 34.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16881613005 |asin = B01NBI0A6R |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WSMM-126_V01" and "ESK-514-5201R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{seealso|Belkin WeMo}}
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:WeMo_Mini_SmartPlug_F7C063_back.jpg|WeMo Mini Smart Plug F7C063 back File:WeMo Mini SmartPlug F7C063 board top a.jpg|WeMo Mini Smart Plug F7C063 opened to show circuit board File:WeMo Mini SmartPlug F7C063 board top b.jpg|WeMo Mini Smart Plug F7C063 opened to show circuit board File:WeMo Mini SmartPlug F7C063 board underneath a.jpg|WeMo Mini Smart Plug F7C063 Logic board removed File:WeMo Mini SmartPlug F7C063 front inside with screw.jpg|WeMo_Mini SmartPlug F7C063 front face inside with screw File:WeMo Mini SmartPlug F7C063 board underneath b.jpg|WeMo Mini Smart Plug F7C063 Logic board detail </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
